Strings.Application you're looking for not in th: Application you're looking for not in this list?
Strings.Whether or not this instance should star: Whether or not this instance should start automatically when the system boots.
Strings.Suspended instances cannot be accessed a: Suspended instances cannot be accessed and prompt the user to contact the administrator.
have firewall rules generated for it.
Strings.Instances in Docker containers are isola: Instances in Docker containers are isolated from other instances and the rest of the system, at the expense of a minor performance impact.
Strings.If the memory policy is 'reserve', how m: If the memory policy is 'reserve', how much memory should be set aside for this container as a minimum. If the memory policy is 'restrict', how much memory this container may use maximum. Setting to 0 results in no limit.
Strings.The maximum number of CPU shares that th: The maximum number of CPU shares that this container may use. Roughly matches up with the number of CPU cores/threads the container can use but non-multithreaded applications may not see performance increases from higher values. Setting to 0 results in no limit.
Strings.Upgrading this instance requires that it: Upgrading this instance requires that it is shut down, along with the application within it. Do you want to proceed with the upgrade?
Strings.Create a new schedule trigger to make ta: Create a new schedule trigger to make tasks run either at a given interval, or in response to an event.
Strings.Please enter the login username for the: Please enter the login username for the new user
Strings.What type of trigger would you like to a: What type of trigger would you like to add?
Strings.For responding to events raised by in-ap: For responding to events raised by in-application actions or by other AMP components
Strings.Create a trigger that runs at a fixed in: Create a trigger that runs at a fixed interval (daily, weekly, etc)
Strings.Create a trigger that runs at a more var: Create a trigger that runs at a more variable interval (E.g. only on weekdays but not weekends)
Strings.An update is available via SteamCMD: An update is available via SteamCMD
Strings.Add a new task to this trigger to perfor: Add a new task to this trigger to perform actions once this trigger is activated, such as taking a backup.
Strings.What task would you like to perform?: What task would you like to perform?
Strings.Are you sure you wish to delete this tas: Are you sure you wish to delete this task? This action cannot be undone.
Strings.Check for available updates via SteamCMD: Check for available updates via SteamCMD
Strings.Click on a parameter to insert it into y: Click on a parameter to insert it into your value.
Strings.Are you sure you wish to delete this tri: Are you sure you wish to delete this trigger? Any tasks associated with it will also be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
Strings.Please enter a name for this login reque: Please enter a name for this login request for future reference.
Strings.Scan this QR code on your mobile device: Scan this QR code on your mobile device to log in as the current user.
Strings.This is a single-use code that cannot be: This is a single-use code that cannot be used again once scanned. It will remain valid for 30 seconds.
Strings.This will permemently delete this user a: This will permemently delete this user and all associated data.
Strings.Offset in seconds to advance or delay ex: Offset in seconds to advance or delay execution of scheduled tasks that use time-based triggers.
Strings.What AMP should do when it starts: What AMP should do when it starts
Strings.Affects all users - change AMPs visual a: Affects all users - change AMPs visual appearance with different themes. You will need to do a force-reload for this to take effect.
The address used for outgoing emails.
Strings.Name: Name
Strings.A short, unique name for your backup: A short, unique name for your backup
Strings.A description of the backup and why you': A description of the backup and why you're taking it (optional)
Strings.Sticky backups won't be deleted to make: Sticky backups won't be deleted to make room for automatic backups
Strings.Are you sure you wish to delete this bac: Are you sure you wish to delete this backup?
Strings.Are you sure you wish to restore this ba: Are you sure you wish to restore this backup? Any files in this archive will overwrite any with the same name that already exist.
Strings.Are you sure you want to move the select: Are you sure you want to move the selected item to the trash?
Strings.Please enter a new directory name: Please enter a new directory name
Strings.Please enter a name for the new director: Please enter a name for the new directory
Strings.You have no files in the clipboard to pa: You have no files in the clipboard to paste
Strings.Otherwise, for support with AMP please v: Otherwise, for support with AMP please visit the
Strings.Always make sure to include the informat: Always make sure to include the information listed below.
Strings.Upgrading this instance may take up to 5: Upgrading this instance may take up to 5 minutes. You will not be able to log into any instances that depend on this ADS instance.
